metadata.title: CVE-2016-7169 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in the File_Upload_Upgrader class inwp-admin/includes/class-file-upload-upgrader.php in the upgrade packageuploader in WordPress before 4.6.1 allows remote authenticated users toaccess arbitrary files via a crafted urlholder parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7169` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentytwo - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.6.1+dfsg-1').
